!2 IIIF Endpoint
When trying to read / display a JP2 image we do this using the iiif endpoint. This endpoints let us 
communicate with an IIIF compatible server (IIPServer) which serves back the data and binaries 
needed for the viewer (IIPMooViewer) to display the image properly.
